main event: A bright white light, about the size of a small star, was seen streaking across the sky going southwest to northeast in Kansas City, Kansas.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 15 minutes.
It was determined that the object was probably an astronomical phenomenon, but not definitely an aircraft.
There were multiple sightings of unidentified objects in the sky over Kansas City between June 14 and June 30, with the objects moving in a northeasterly direction.
One sighting described an object that was circular in shape, approximately 30-40 feet in diameter, and hovering at an altitude of 1000-1500 feet.
The hovering object suddenly accelerated at a tremendous rate of speed and disappeared from sight in seconds, with no sound associated with it.
sighted object: a bright white light streaking across the sky
